Package com.paiondata.aristotle.repository

Interface GraphRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Graph,Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<Graph,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Graph,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Graph>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Graph,Long>
@Repository public interface GraphRepository extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<Graph,Long>
Repository interface for managing graphs using Neo4j. This interface provides methods for CRUD operations on graphs and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getGraphByUuid

      @Query("MATCH (g:Graph) WHERE g.uuid = $uuid RETURN g") Graph getGraphByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      Returns:
      the graph

    • createAndBindGraph

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.uidcid = $userUidcid CREATE (g:Graph {uuid: $graphUuid, title: $title, description: $description, create_time: $currentTime, update_time: $currentTime}) WITH u, g CREATE (u)-[r:RELATION {name: \'HAVE\', uuid: $relationUuid, create_time: $currentTime, update_time: $currentTime}]->(g) RETURN g") Graph createAndBindGraph(@Param("title") String title, @Param("description") String description, @Param("userUidcid") String userUidcid, @Param("graphUuid") String graphUuid, @Param("relationUuid") String relationUuid, @Param("currentTime") String currentTime)
      Creates and binds a new graph to an existing user.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the graph
      description - the description of the graph
      userUidcid - the UID/CID of the user
      graphUuid - the UUID of the new graph
      relationUuid - the UUID of the relationship
      currentTime - the current timestamp
      Returns:
      the created graph

    • deleteByUuids

      @Query("MATCH (g:Graph) WHERE g.uuid IN $uuids DETACH DELETE g") void deleteByUuids(List<String> uuids)
      Deletes graphs by their UUIDs.
      Parameters:
      uuids - the list of UUIDs of the graphs to be deleted

    • getGraphNodeUuidsByGraphUuids

      @Query("MATCH (g:Graph) WHERE g.uuid IN $uuids WITH g MATCH (g)-[r:RELATION]->(gn:GraphNode) RETURN gn.uuid") List<String> getGraphNodeUuidsByGraphUuids(List<String> uuids)
      Retrieves the UUIDs of graph nodes associated with the given graphs.
      Parameters:
      uuids - the list of UUIDs of the graphs
      Returns:
      the list of UUIDs of the graph nodes

    • getGraphByGraphUuidAndUidcid

      @Query("MATCH (u:User{uidcid: $uidcid})-[:RELATION]->(g:Graph{uuid: $graphUuid}) RETURN g.uuid") String getGraphByGraphUuidAndUidcid(@Param("graphUuid") String graphUuid, @Param("uidcid") String uidcid)
      Retrieves the UUID of a graph associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph
      uidcid - the UID/CID of the user
      Returns:
      the UUID of the graph
